              def check_authentication

              def calculate_completion_rate
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                total = Course.group(:status).count.values.sum
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                return "#{Settings.completion_rate.zero}%" if total.zero?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                finished = Course.finished.count
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                rate = (finished.to_f / total * Settings.percentage).round
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                "#{rate}%"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end

              def update_status?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                if params[:activated].present? &&
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                   @user_supervisor.update(activated: params[:activated])
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116.

      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117.

      120.

                false

    121. 
            

            

              end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123.

              def handle_bulk_statuses
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                supervisor_ids = params[:supervisor_ids]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                return flash_no_selection if supervisor_ids.blank?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128.

              def flash_bulk_status_result updated_count
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                if updated_count.positive?
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136.

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142.

              def toggle_supervisors_status supervisors
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                updated_count = 0
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                supervisors.each do |supervisor|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  new_status = supervisor.activated? ? false : true
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  updated_count += 1 if supervisor.update(activated: new_status)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                updated_count
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151.

                flash[:danger] = t(".supervisor_no_selection")

    153. 
            

            

                redirect_to admin_users_path

              def handle_add_role_supervisor?

    161. 
            

            

                return false if params[:supervisor_ids].blank?

            module Positionable

              def association_records_for association_name
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                send(association_name).reject(&:marked_for_destruction?)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              def validate_unique_positions positions
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                present_positions = positions.compact
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                duplicates = present_positions.select do |v|
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  present_positions.count(v) > 1
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end.uniq
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                errors.add(:base, :must_be_unique_positions) if duplicates.any?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              def normalize_positions_for association_name
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                records = association_records_for(association_name)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                with_pos, without_pos = records.partition {|r| r.position.present?}
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                ordered = with_pos.sort_by {|r| r.position.to_i} + without_pos
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                ordered.each_with_index do |record, index|
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  record.position = index + Settings.digits.digit_one
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def validate_and_normalize_positions
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                return unless respond_to?(:positionable_association_name, true)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                assoc_name = positionable_association_name
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                positions = association_records_for(assoc_name).map(&:position)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                validate_unique_positions(positions)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                return if errors.any?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                normalize_positions_for(assoc_name)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            end

              def load_user_by_id

            class SubjectsController < ApplicationController

              # GET /subjects.json

              def index

    4.

              def search_subjects query, excluded_ids
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                Subject.includes(:tasks)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                       .where.not(id: excluded_ids)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

    26.

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

              def build_subjects_json subjects
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                subjects.map do |subject|
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  {
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    id: subject.id,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    name: subject.name,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    estimated_time_days: subject.estimated_time_days,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    max_score: subject.max_score,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    tasks: subject.tasks.map {|task| {id: task.id, name: task.name}},
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    task_names: subject.tasks.pluck(:name)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            end

    6. 
            

            

                :tasks,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                {user_subjects: [:user, :comments]}
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              ].freeze
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              SUPERVISORS_INCLUDES = [:user_courses].freeze
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              COURSE_PRELOAD = {course_subjects: [:subject, :tasks, :user_subjects]}.freeze
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # Member type constants
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              MEMBER_TYPE_TRAINER = "trainer".freeze
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              MEMBER_TYPE_TRAINEE = "trainee".freeze
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # Template constants
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              TEMPLATE_COURSES_EDIT = "courses/edit".freeze
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # Error message constants
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              ERROR_ADD_SUBJECT_FAILED = "add_subject failed: %<class>s: %<message>s".freeze
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              before_action :load_course,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                            only: %i(show members subjects supervisors leave search_members
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                                    edit update add_subject)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              before_action :load_subject_to_add, only: [:add_subject]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              before_action :validate_subject_for_add, only: [:add_subject]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_supervisor_access!,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                            only: %i(show members subjects supervisors leave search_members)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_multiple_supervisors, only: [:leave]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              before_action :set_courses_page_class
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              def index
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                @statuses = build_statuses
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                courses_query = accessible_courses
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                .includes(:user)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                                .with_counts
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                .filter_by_params(params)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                                .ordered_by_start_date
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                @pagy, @courses = pagy courses_query, limit: Settings.ui.items_per_page
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses/:id
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def show
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                redirect_to subjects_supervisor_course_path @course
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses/:id/members
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              def members
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @trainers = @course.supervisors.includes SUPERVISORS_INCLUDES
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @pagy, @trainees = pagy(
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  @course.user_courses.trainees.includes(:user),
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  limit: Settings.pagination.course_members_per_page
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                )
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @trainee_count = @pagy.count
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                @trainer_count = @trainers.count
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                @subject_count = @course.subjects.count
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                render template: Settings.templates.courses.members
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses/:id/subjects
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              def subjects
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                @subjects = @course.course_subjects.includes(EAGER_LOAD_SUBJECTS)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                                   .ordered_by_position
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                @subject_count = @subjects.count
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                @trainee_count = @course.trainees_count
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                @trainer_count = @course.supervisors.count
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                render template: Settings.templates.courses.subjects
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses/:id/search_members
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              def search_members
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                users = find_available_users
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                render json: users.select(:id, :name, :email)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses/:id/supervisors
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def supervisors
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                @trainers = @course.supervisors.includes SUPERVISORS_INCLUDES
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                @trainer_count = @trainers.count
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                @subject_count = @course.subjects.count
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                @trainee_count = @course.trainees_count
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              # POST supervisor/courses
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def create
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                @course = Course.new course_params.merge(user_id: current_user.id)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                if @course.save
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = t(".course_created_successfully")
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  redirect_to supervisor_courses_path
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                else
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  flash[:danger] = t(".course_creation_failed")
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              # DELETE /supervisor/courses/:id/leave
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              def leave
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                if @course.supervisors.destroy(current_user)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = t(".success")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  redirect_to supervisor_courses_path
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                else
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  flash[:danger] = t(".failed")
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  redirect_back fallback_location: members_fallback_path
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              # GET supervisor/courses/new
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              def new
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                @course = Course.new
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                @course.course_subjects.build.build_subject
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              # GET /supervisor/courses/:id/edit
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              def edit
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                @subjects = @course.course_subjects.includes(EAGER_LOAD_SUBJECTS)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                                   .ordered_by_position
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                render template: TEMPLATE_COURSES_EDIT
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              # PATCH /supervisor/courses/:id
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              def update
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                if update_course_with_reorder(course_params)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = t(".course_updated_successfully")
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  redirect_to subjects_supervisor_course_path(@course)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                else
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  reload_subjects_for_edit
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  flash[:danger] = t(".course_update_failed")
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  render template: TEMPLATE_COURSES_EDIT, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              def update_course_with_reorder permitted_params
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                CourseSubject.transaction do
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  @course.assign_attributes(permitted_params)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  raise ActiveRecord::Rollback unless @course.save
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                @course.errors.empty?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              # POST /supervisor/courses/:id/add_subject
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              def add_subject
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                course_subject = @course.course_subjects.build(
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  subject: @subject,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  position: next_position
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                )
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  course_subject.save!
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  copy_subject_tasks_to_course_subject(@subject, course_subject)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  create_user_subjects_for_existing_trainees(course_subject)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  success: true,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  message: t(".subject_added_successfully", subject_name: @subject.name)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error(format(ERROR_ADD_SUBJECT_FAILED,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                                          class: e.class, message: e.message))
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                render json: {success: false, message: t(".failed_to_add_subject")},
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                       status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              private
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def find_available_users
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                member_type = determine_member_type
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                users = User.where(role: User.roles[member_type])
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                existing_ids = existing_user_ids?(member_type)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                users = users.where.not(id: existing_ids)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                users = apply_search_filter(users)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                users.sort_by_name.limit(20)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              def determine_member_type
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                params[:type] == MEMBER_TYPE_TRAINER ? :supervisor : :trainee
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              def existing_user_ids? member_type
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                if member_type == :trainee
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  @course.users.where(role: :trainee).pluck(:id)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                else
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  @course.supervisors.pluck(:id)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              def apply_search_filter users
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                query = params[:q].to_s
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                return users if query.blank?
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                users.filter_by_name(query)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def copy_subject_tasks_to_course_subject subject, course_subject
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                subject.tasks.each do |subject_task|
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  course_subject.tasks.create!(
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    name: subject_task.name
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  )
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              def reload_subjects_for_edit
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                @course.reload
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                @subjects = @course.course_subjects.includes(EAGER_LOAD_SUBJECTS)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                                   .ordered_by_position
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              def create_user_subjects_for_existing_trainees course_subject
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                @course.user_courses.includes(:user).each do |user_course|
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  next unless user_course.user.trainee?
          
      218.

              def handle_create_task?
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                is_first_task = session[:count_create_task].nil? ||
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                                session.delete(:count_create_task).zero?
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                task = @course_subject.tasks.build(task_params)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                return false unless task.save
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                reset_all_user_subjects_completion if is_first_task
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                true
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                flash[:danger] = t(".create_failed")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                false
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147.

              def handle_create_comment?

    152.

              def reset_all_user_subjects_completion

              def create

                if @subject.save

              def update
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                if @subject.update(subject_params_for_update)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = t(".update_success", subject_name: @subject.name)

    42. 
            

            

                else
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  flash[:danger] = @subject.errors.full_messages.join(", ")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                redirect_to supervisor_subject_path(@subject)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48.

              # DELETE /supervisor/subjects/:id
          
      49.

              def destroy
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                if @subject.destroy
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = t(".subject_deleted")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52.

    53. 
            

            

                  flash[:danger] = t(".delete_failed")

    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                redirect_to supervisor_subjects_path
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              # DELETE /supervisor/subjects/:id/destroy_tasks
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              def destroy_tasks
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                task_ids = params[:task_ids] || []
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                if task_ids.any?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  destroyed_count = @subject.tasks.where(id: task_ids).destroy_all.size
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = t(".n_tasks_deleted", count: destroyed_count)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = t(".no_tasks_to_delete")
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                redirect_to edit_supervisor_subject_path(@subject)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              private
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def subject_params_for_create
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73.

              def add_trainers_to_course trainers
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                added_count = 0
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                error_message = nil
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  trainers.find_each do |trainer|
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    unless @course.supervisors.exists?(trainer.id)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      course_supervisor = @course.course_supervisors
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                                                 .build(user_id: trainer.id)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      if course_supervisor.save
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        added_count += 1
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      else
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        error_message = t(".failed_to_add_trainer", name: trainer.name)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        raise ActiveRecord::Rollback
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                if error_message
          
      57.

                  {success: false, error_message: error_message}
          
      58.

      59.

    38. 
            

            

                  trainees.find_each do |trainee|
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    user_course = @course.user_courses
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                         .find_or_initialize_by(user_id: trainee.id)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    if user_course.new_record?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      user_course.joined_at = Time.current
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      if user_course.save
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        created_count += 1
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      else
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        error_message = t(".failed_to_add_trainee", name: trainee.name)

    47.

      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48.

      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    end
          
      50.

                  end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                if error_message
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  {success: false, error_message: error_message}
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                else
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  {success: true, created_count: created_count}
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e

    59. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Failed to add trainees to course: #{e.message}")
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                {success: false, error_message: t(".unexpected_error")}
          
      61.

              end
          
      62.

              def load_course

    66.

              def handle_update_status?

              def handle_bulk_statuses

              def flash_bulk_status_result updated_count

    107. 
            

            

                if updated_count.positive?

    108.

              def toggle_trainees_status trainees
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                updated_count = 0
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                trainees.each do |trainee|
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  new_status = trainee.activated? ? false : true
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  updated_count += 1 if trainee.update(activated: new_status,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                                                       remember_digest: nill)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                updated_count
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123.

              def load_user_course
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                @user_course =
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  case action_name.to_sym
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  when :update_user_course_status
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    @user_trainee.user_courses
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                                 .find_by(course_id: params[:course_id])

    139. 
            

            

                  when :delete_user_course

    140.

      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142.

      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                return if @user_course
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                flash[:danger] = t(".course.not_found")
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                redirect_to supervisor_user_path(@user_trainee)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147.

      148.

              def user_params

    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153.

              def update_user_course_status?

                flash[:danger] = t(".update_failed")
          
      157.

              def delete_user_course?

                flash[:danger] = t(".delete_failed")
          
      164.

                false

                case params[:commit].strip
          
      30.

              def handle_report_submission status:, success_message:

    104. 
            

            

                @daily_report.status = status

    105. 
            

            

                if @daily_report.save

    106.

      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108.

      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113.

              def handle_update status:, success_message:
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                if @daily_report.update(daily_report_params.merge(status:))
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  flash[:success] = success_message
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  redirect_to trainee_daily_reports_path
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                else
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122.

              def handle_report_destroy

      129.

              def load_draft_daily_report

                @daily_report = current_user.daily_reports

              def ensure_user_enrollments

              def user_subject_params

              def normalize_finish_params!
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                user_subject_hash = params[:user_subject]
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                return unless user_subject_hash
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                started_at = user_subject_hash[:started_at].presence || Date.current
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                completed_at = user_subject_hash[:completed_at].presence || Date.current
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                user_subject_hash[:started_at] = started_at
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                user_subject_hash[:completed_at] = completed_at
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Derive enum status from dates
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                derived_status = @user_subject.compute_finish_status(completed_at)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                user_subject_hash[:status] = UserSubject.statuses[derived_status]
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

              def load_user_task

                  task_id: params[:task_id], user_subject_id: params[:user_subject_id]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                ) do |user_task|
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  user_task.status = Settings.user_task.status.not_done
          
      49.

                  user_task.spent_time = nil
          
      50.

              def gravatar_for object, options = {size: Settings.ui.gravatar.default_size}

    3.

              def full_title page_title = ""

              def page_class

              def subject_status course_subject

              def format_date_for_input date

              def subject_finished? course_subject
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                past_finish_date?(course_subject) || all_trainees_finished?(course_subject)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              1
            

            

              def subject_in_progress? course_subject
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                return false unless course_subject.start_date && course_subject.finish_date
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                Date.current.between?(course_subject.start_date, course_subject.finish_date)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109.

              def past_finish_date? course_subject
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                course_subject.finish_date && course_subject.finish_date < Date.current
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              1
            

            

              def all_trainees_finished? course_subject
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # If there are no user_subjects (no trainees), treat as not finished
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                return false if course_subject.user_subjects.empty?
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                if course_subject.association(:user_subjects).loaded?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  course_subject.user_subjects.none? do |user_subject|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    FINISHED_STATUS_VALUES.exclude?(user_subject.status_before_type_cast)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                else
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  course_subject.user_subjects
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                                .where.not(status: FINISHED_STATUS_VALUES)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                                .none?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            end

              def course_status_badge status

                            when "not_started" then "label label-default"

                  {tasks_attributes: [
