    19. 
            

            

                    :id,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    :name,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    :_destroy
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  ]}
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                ]}
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              ].freeze
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              IMAGE_DISPLAY_SIZE = [120, 80].freeze
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              URL_FORMAT = %r{\Ahttps://.*}
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # Enums
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              enum status: {not_started: Settings.course.status.not_started,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                            in_progress: Settings.course.status.in_progress,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                            finished: Settings.course.status.finished}
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # Associations
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              belongs_to :user
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              has_many :user_courses, dependent: :destroy
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              has_many :users, through: :user_courses
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              has_many :daily_reports, dependent: :destroy
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              has_many :course_subjects, dependent: :destroy
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              has_many :subjects, through: :course_subjects
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              has_many :course_supervisors, dependent: :destroy
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              has_many :supervisors, through: :course_supervisors, source: :user
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              has_one_attached :image do |attachable|
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                attachable.variant :display, resize_to_limit: IMAGE_DISPLAY_SIZE
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              accepts_nested_attributes_for :course_subjects, allow_destroy: true
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              validates :name, presence: true,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        length: {
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                          maximum: Settings.course.max_name_length
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        },
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        uniqueness: {case_sensitive: false}
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              validates :link_to_course, presence: true,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        format: {with: URL_FORMAT,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                                 message: :must_be_valid_url}
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              validates :start_date, presence: true
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              validates :finish_date, presence: true
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              validate :at_least_one_supervisor_selected
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              validate :finish_date_after_start_date
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              validate :start_date_within_allowed_range
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              validate :finish_date_within_allowed_range
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              validates :image, presence: true,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        content_type: {
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                          in: Settings.course.allowed_image_types,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                          message: :invalid_image_type
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        },
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        size: {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                          less_than: Settings.course.max_image_size.megabytes,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          message: :image_size_exceeded,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                          size: Settings.course.max_image_size.megabytes
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                        }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              before_save :update_status_based_on_dates
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              after_create :clone_tasks_for_course
          
      75.

              # Scopes
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              scope :upcoming, -> {where(start_date: Date.current.next_day..)}
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              scope :completed, -> {where(finish_date: ..Date.current.prev_day)}
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              scope :ordered_by_start_date, -> {order(:start_date)}
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              scope :by_status, ->(status) {where(status:) if status.present?}
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              scope :supervised_by, ->(user_id) {where(supervisor_id: user_id)}
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              scope :with_counts, (lambda do
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                select(
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  "courses.*",
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  "(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_courses
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    INNER JOIN users ON users.id = user_courses.user_id
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    WHERE user_courses.course_id = courses.id
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    AND users.role = #{User.roles[:trainee]}) AS trainees_count",
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  "(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_supervisors
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    INNER JOIN users ON users.id = course_supervisors.user_id
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    WHERE course_supervisors.course_id = courses.id
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    AND users.role = #{User.roles[:supervisor]}) AS trainers_count"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                )
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> {order(created_at: :desc)}
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              scope :search_by_name, (lambda do |query|
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                if query.present?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  where("name LIKE ?",
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        "%#{sanitize_sql_like(query)}%")
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              end)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              scope :search_by_trainer_name, (lambda do |query|
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                if query.present?
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  joins(:supervisors)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    .where("users.name LIKE ?",
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                           "%#{sanitize_sql_like(query)}%")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    .distinct
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              scope :by_start_date_from, (lambda do |date|
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                                            where("start_date >= ?", date) if date.present?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                                          end)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              scope :by_start_date_to, (lambda do |date|
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                                          where("start_date <= ?", date) if date.present?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                                        end)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              scope :by_trainer, (lambda do |trainer_id|

                if trainer_id.present?

    119.

      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              end)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              scope :filter_by_params, (lambda do |params|
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                relation = self
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                search_query = params[:search_query]
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                if search_query.present?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  relation = if params[:search_type] == Settings.course.creators
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                               relation.search_by_trainer_name(search_query)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                             else
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                               relation.search_by_name(search_query)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                             end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                relation = relation.by_status(params[:status])
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                                   .by_start_date_from(params[:start_date_from])
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                                   .by_start_date_to(params[:start_date_to])
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                relation
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              end)
          
      140.

              scope :by_course, (lambda do |course_ids|

                return all if status.blank?

      154.

    155. 
            

            

              def trainees_count
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                self[:trainees_count] || user_courses
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  .joins(:user)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  .where(users: {role: :trainee})
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  .count
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def trainee_count
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                user_courses.trainees.count

    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              def trainers_count

    167. 
            

            

                self[:trainers_count] || course_supervisors
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  .joins(:user)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  .where(users: {role: :supervisor})
          
      170.

                  .count

    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172.

              def subjects_count

                Course.subjects.count

    175.

      176.

      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              private
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              def finish_date_after_start_date
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                return unless start_date && finish_date
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                return unless finish_date < start_date
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                errors.add(:finish_date,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                           :finish_date_after_start_date)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def at_least_one_supervisor_selected
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                return unless supervisor_ids.blank? || supervisor_ids.compact_blank.empty?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                errors.add(:supervisor_ids,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                           :at_least_one_trainer)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              def start_date_within_allowed_range
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                return if start_date.blank?
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                return if start_date.between?(1.year.ago.to_date, 1.year.from_now.to_date)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                errors.add(:start_date, :must_be_within_one_year_from_now)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              def finish_date_within_allowed_range
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                return if finish_date.blank?
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                return if finish_date.between?(1.year.ago.to_date, 1.year.from_now.to_date)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                errors.add(:finish_date, :must_be_within_one_year_from_now)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              def filter_and_get_positions
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                course_subjects.reject(&:marked_for_destruction?).map(&:position)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              def positionable_association_name
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                :course_subjects
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              def clone_tasks_for_course
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                course_subjects.each do |course_subject|
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  subject = course_subject.subject
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  next if subject.tasks.blank?
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  subject.tasks.each do |original_task|
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    cloned_task_attributes = original_task.attributes.except(
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                      "id",
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      "taskable_id",
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      "taskable_type",
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                      "created_at",
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      "updated_at"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                    )
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    raise ActiveRecord::Rollback unless
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                      course_subject.tasks.create(cloned_task_attributes)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              def update_status_based_on_dates
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                return self.status = :not_started unless start_date && finish_date
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                today = Date.current
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                self.status = if today < start_date
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                                :not_started
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                              elsif today.between?(start_date, finish_date)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                                :in_progress
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                              else
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246.

      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                              end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

              end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            end

              # Returns true if the given token matches the digest.
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              1
            

            

              def authenticated? attribute, token
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                digest = send("#{attribute}_digest")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                return false unless digest

    110.

                BCrypt::Password.new(digest).is_password?(token)

              def birthday_within_valid_years

    159. 
            

            

                return if birthday.nil?

              def create_user_subjects_for_course_subjects

    40.

    42. 
            

            

                  user_subject = user_subjects.create!(

    43.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48.

                  # Create user_tasks for all tasks of the course_subject

    50. 
            

            

                    user_subject.user_tasks.create!(
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      user: user,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      task: task,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      status: Settings.user_task.status.not_done
          
      54.

              def display_status
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Infer status from course_subject dates if not explicitly started
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                if completed_at

              def overdue?

              def comment_count

              # Compute enum symbol for finished status based on completed_at vs deadline
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
              1
            

            

              def compute_finish_status completed_date
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                deadline = course_subject&.finish_date
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                return :finished_ontime unless deadline && completed_date
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                completion = completed_date.to_date
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                return :finished_early if completion < deadline
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                return :finished_ontime if completion == deadline
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                :finished_but_overdue
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end

              def determine_finished_status
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                return finished_ontime_status unless course_subject.finish_date
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                compare_completion_with_deadline
          
      79.

              def finished_ontime_status
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                Settings.user_subject.display_status.finished_ontime
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
              1
            

            

              def compare_completion_with_deadline
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                completion_date = completed_at.to_date
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                deadline = course_subject.finish_date
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if completion_date < deadline
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  Settings.user_subject.display_status.finished_early
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                elsif completion_date == deadline
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  Settings.user_subject.display_status.finished_ontime
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  Settings.user_subject.display_status.finished_but_overdue
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
              1
            

            

              def inferred_status_from_schedule
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                start_date = course_subject.start_date
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                finish_date = course_subject.finish_date
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                # Without dates we cannot infer; treat as not started
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                unless start_date && finish_date
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  return Settings.user_subject.display_status.not_started
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                if Date.current > finish_date
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  return Settings.user_subject.display_status.overdue_and_not_finished
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                if Date.current.between?(start_date, finish_date)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  return Settings.user_subject.display_status.in_progress
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                Settings.user_subject.display_status.not_started
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            end
          
      117.

            class UserTask < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Enums
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              enum status: {not_done: Settings.user_task.status.not_done,
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                            done: Settings.user_task.status.done}
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Associations
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              belongs_to :user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              belongs_to :task, -> {with_deleted}
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              belongs_to :user_subject
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              has_many_attached :documents
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              validates :user_id, uniqueness: {scope: :task_id}
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              validates :spent_time,
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                        numericality: {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                          greater_than_or_equal_to: Settings.user_task.min_spent_time
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        },
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        allow_nil: true
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              validates :documents,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        content_type: {
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                          in: Settings.user_task.allowed_document_types
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        },
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        size: {
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                          less_than: Settings.user_task.max_document_size.megabytes
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                        }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # Scopes
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              scope :by_user, ->(user) {where(user:)}
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              scope :by_task, ->(task) {where(task:)}
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              scope :tasks_done, -> {where(status: :done)}
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              scope :by_user_subject, ->(user_subject) {where(user_subject:)}
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> {order(created_at: :desc)}
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              scope :not_done, -> {where(status: :not_done)}
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              scope :with_deleted, -> {all}
          
      35.

              def self.run today: Date.current

                new(today).run

              def start_subjects
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                UserSubject.includes(:course_subject)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                           .where(started_at: nil)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                           .find_each do |user_subject|
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  course_subject = user_subject.course_subject
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  next unless course_subject&.start_date && course_subject.finish_date
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  if @today.between?(course_subject.start_date, course_subject.finish_date)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    user_subject.update_columns(
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      started_at: @today,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      status: UserSubject.statuses[:in_progress]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    )
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  elsif @today > course_subject.finish_date
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    user_subject.update_columns(
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      status: UserSubject.statuses[:overdue_and_not_finished]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    )
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

      35.

              def normalize_finished
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                UserSubject.includes(:course_subject)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                           .where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                           .find_each do |user_subject|
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  course_subject = user_subject.course_subject
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  next unless course_subject&.finish_date
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  completion_date = user_subject.completed_at.to_date
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  deadline = course_subject.finish_date
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  new_status = if completion_date < deadline
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                                 :finished_early
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                               elsif completion_date == deadline
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                                 :finished_ontime
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                               else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                                 :finished_but_overdue
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                               end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  user_subject.update_columns(
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    status: UserSubject.statuses[new_status]
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

    73.
